name: Super Bitcoin Jumper
description:
Created by Alexander Khramushin ( Super1kWattGames ). I am a repairman in a Internet provider. I am an absolute beginner and work alone. All assets like graphics, musics, sounds was created by me.

Super bitcoin jumper is a short platformer game, where you need to save the internet.  The game has 20 levels.

The people’s happiness is in your hands. Lets go!

Controls

left/right - run

x - jump

c - action

Esc - pause

The game support a gamepad.

Note. The game automatically saves progress when you start a new level.
